title: Cane River Creole National Historical Park: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours       Oakland Plantation A guided tour of the Slave/Tenant Quarters is available every day at 12:30 p.m.  A guided tour of the Oakland Plantation main house is available every day at 1:00 p.m. Tour size is limited to 15 people per tour. Depending on staff levels more tours may be available.  Magnolia Plantation A guided walk of the grounds of Magnolia Plantation is available at 10:00 a.m. every Friday, Saturday and Sunday.  Depending on staff levels more tours may be available. The main house at Magnolia Plantation is privately owned and is not open to the public. For more information on guided tours  or make a group tour reservation for Oakland or Magnolia Plantations call 318 356-8441.    Â     Heritage ranger Jean Carter giving a tour. NPS photo
